duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitoring the purchase order lifecycle to its entirety.
Auditing bid uploads and purchase requisitions ensuring accurate category standardizations.
Monitoring construction progress stages and delivering status reports.
Assisting with research, analysis, and reconciliation of accounts payable with vendor ledger.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Data Management, or similar field.
3+ years of working experience in Procurement, Purchasing, Acquisitions, or similar field.
Experience working in the Construction, Property Management, or Maintenance industry preferred.
Intermediate proficiency of Outlook, Microsoft Office, Excel including pivot tables and VLOOKUP formulas.
